title: FS:  T206 Set of 518 - low grade
author: parkerj33

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Set of 518 - low grade
posts.post_content:
I have a lower grade (1-2s) t206 set missing the 6 biggies (wagner, doyle, plank, magie, demmitt stl, ohara stl).

This set will be available for viewing and/or purchase at the national - will be at Howard Chasser's Booth.

I am asking $85k.  I have a google doc here that outlines every card and its condition.  Pics coming too.

NOTE:  I will consider partial trades (goudey ruths, or other t206s).

stats summary:
graded : 32 (mostly hof)
raw: 486

good+ / vg: 122
good: 235
poor-fair :  161 (of these 11 are trimmed (including young port), 47 have paper loss on back or glued paper, 39 have a mark - usually pencil on back)

Backs:
Piedmont or SC:  483
Polar Bear: 20
Old Mill Southern: 13
Sovereign 350: 3 (JBarry, Dineen, McCormick)
Sovereign 150: 1 (Lindaman)

thanks, jim.

fantastic stuff, Jim. the eye appeal on those 1.5s/2s is amazing. GLWS.
Congrats on the feat of 518 Jim! Always neat to see sets go up for sale. Good luck sir.

Thanks guys. I still have my main higher grade set of 521.  


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
FYI, This set will be on display and available at the national in Howard Chasser's booth.
